titles.title: To suspend for 3 years the duty on fenbuconazole.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/10/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on alpha-(2-(4- chlorophenyl)-ethyl)-alpha-phenyl-1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-propanenitrile (fenbuconazole).
